This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsOrange glowing UFO today in Central Mass flying NE at low speed right after sunset. No, it was not a plane in route to Boston (this object was flying lower then 10 thousand feet where Boston heading planes fly) nor fire works, it was flying on a NE straight line, nor was it reflecting the light from the sun as it was glowing all around. It was of the cigar shape type with no visible wings
